---

_The Forge_ denotes strength through diversity. As long as you have _The Forge_ invested, you can carry more than normal— increase your maximum and encumbered Bulk limits by 2.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> envision, Interact;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You pass the card over an adjacent [broken](/Conditions.aspx?ID=2) (but not destroyed) object ([magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103) or otherwise) of up to 4 Bulk, and restore the object to its full Hit Point total, removing the broken condition in the process.
